name: AbstractHorseEntityHelper
description: The `AbstractHorseEntityHelper` class provides specialized access to horse-like entities in Minecraft, including horses, donkeys, mules, and llamas. This class offers comprehensive methods for monitoring and interacting with horse-specific behaviors such as taming status, equipment, statistics, and various states.
overview: This helper is particularly useful for creating scripts that manage horse companions, analyze horse stats for breeding purposes, coordinate mounted combat, or track the status of tameable horse-like entities in the world. The class serves as a base for more specific horse helpers (like `HorseEntityHelper`) while providing all the core functionality for abstract horse entities.

constructors.description:
AbstractHorseEntityHelper instances are not typically created directly by scripters. Instead, they are obtained through:
- Entity-related events (e.g., `EntitySpawn`, `EntityDeath`, `EntityInteract`)
- World entity queries using type filtering
- Casting from generic EntityHelper instances using type-specific methods

methods.name: getOwner
methods.description: Retrieves the owner of the horse, if any.

methods.name: isTame
methods.description: Checks if the horse is tamed.

methods.name: isAngry
methods.description: Checks if the horse is currently angry.

methods.name: isSaddled
methods.description: Checks if the horse is saddled.

methods.name: canWearArmor
methods.description: Indicates if the horse type can wear armor (e.g., horses, not donkeys or llamas).

methods.name: canBeSaddled
methods.description: Indicates if the horse can be saddled.

methods.name: getInventorySize
methods.description: Returns the number of inventory slots the horse has, including saddle and storage.

methods.name: isBred
methods.description: Checks if the horse was bred by players.

methods.name: isEating
methods.description: Checks if the horse is currently eating grass.

methods.name: getJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Retrieves the raw jump strength attribute value of the horse.

methods.name: getHorseJumpHeight
methods.description: Calculates the approximate jump height in blocks based on the horse's jump strength.

methods.name: getMaxJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Returns the maximum possible jump strength attribute for a horse.

methods.name: getMinJumpStrengthStat
methods.description: Returns the minimum possible jump strength attribute for a horse.

methods.name: getSpeedStat
methods.description: Retrieves the raw speed attribute value of the horse.

methods.name: getHorseSpeed
methods.description: Calculates the approximate speed in blocks per second based on the horse's speed attribute.

methods.name: getMaxSpeedStat
methods.description: Returns the maximum possible speed attribute for a horse.

methods.name: getMinSpeedStat
methods.description: Returns the minimum possible speed attribute for a horse.

methods.name: getHealthStat
methods.description: Retrieves the current maximum health attribute of the horse.

methods.name: getMaxHealthStat
methods.description: Returns the maximum possible health attribute for a horse.

methods.name: getMinHealthStat
methods.description: Returns the minimum possible health attribute for a horse.
